tool_description: Classifies content into age-appropriate categories based on combined analysis results from multiple detection tools.

nsfw_score.description: NSFW detection score from content analysis

violence_score.description: Violence detection score from content analysis

detected_objects.description: List of detected objects from object recognition

minor_faces_detected.description: Whether faces of minors were detected in the content

classification_system.description: Rating system to use: ESRB, MPAA, PEGI, or CUSTOM

error_messages: Invalid score range: All score parameters must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Invalid classification system: classification_system must be one of: ESRB, MPAA, PEGI, CUSTOM.
Missing required scores: nsfw_score, violence_score, profanity_score, and skin_exposure_level are required.
Classification failed: Unable to determine appropriate age classification based on provided data.
Inconsistent data: The provided analysis scores contain conflicting or invalid information.
usage: Provide analysis scores from content detection tools along with any detected objects and face analysis results. Choose appropriate classification_system for your platform's needs.

age_rating.description: Age-appropriate rating like E, T, M for ESRB or G, PG, R for MPAA

content_warnings.description: Specific content warnings like violence, language, suggestive themes

recommended_action.description: Recommended moderation action: approve, restrict, review, block
